name.en: Seminar in accounting and corporate governance

goal.en: “This course aims to 1. provide students with basic knowledge of theoretical and practical issues related to corporate governance. 2. discuss several practical cases on corporate governance 3. introduce current academic literature on corporate governance 4. help students familiar with academic research design“
goal.ch: “1. 使學生認識公司治理的基礎概念及台灣目前公司治理現況 2. 以個案方式討論並分析台灣公司治理之現況及問題 3. 引導學生認識公司治理相關學術研究 4. 幫助學生學習學術研究方法及設計“

content.en: “This class will consist of three parts. In the first part, the instructor will lecture and explain the basic concepts of corporate governance and the current practice. In the second part, students will lead the discussion of cases. In the third part, students will present several academic papers of corporate governance.“
content.ch: 本課程主要分為三部分。第一部分由教師講授並介紹公司治理概念及現況。第二部分由學生帶領討論台灣公司治理之個案分析。第三部分由學生帶領討論公司治理相關學術研究。

textbook.en: 公司治理-個案與分析模式 葉銀華著 滄海書局出版
